sentences.en: Don't always rely on others to understand and sympathize.
sentences.cn: 不要老是指望别人的理解和同情.

sentences.en: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.cn: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.en: I know I can rely on you to sort it out.
sentences.cn: 我相信你会把它解决好的。

sentences.en: I rely too much on convenience food.
It would be better to rely on ourselves than on others.
Most poultry farmers have to rely on commercially manufactured feeds.
sentences.cn: 多数饲养家禽的农场主不得不依赖商业化生产的饲料。

sentences.en: The investigation will rely on existing powers to subpoena documents.
sentences.cn: 该调查将凭借现有权力要求将各种相关文件呈堂。

sentences.en: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.cn: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

sentences.en: We can rely on our children to do such work.
sentences.cn: 这样的工作我们可以放心地让孩子们去做.

sentences.en: We rely on his finishing the work today.
sentences.cn: 我们信赖他今天能完工.

sentences.en: You can always rely on Jim, he won't fail you.
sentences.cn: 你可以永远信任吉姆, 他不会让你失望的.

sentences.en: You can rely on him every time.
sentences.cn: 你无论何时都可以信赖他.

sentences.en: You can rely on me for help.
You can't rely on the weather.
You may rely upon my early arrival.
sentences.cn: 你放心好了,我会早到的.

sentences.en: You should rely on your own efforts.

trans.tran_en: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly

trans.tran_cn: 依靠， 依赖； 信赖， 指望
trans.tran_en: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly
